channel.title: Recording screen
channel.description: Is there and if there is, could you link me to it, An Application, Like Camtasia or whatever, that records a video of a chosen section of a screen? I don't think WINE can make it do that, but if it can, let me know. I am not in too much of a hurry. I am want to do this, to show a friend a program in Linux that he would be really interested in. But, he will not install Linux atm.

item.title: Recording screen
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

yeah, that’s what I was looking for, thanks.
